title: visited second time
review: This was my second visit to the place in twenty years and it still under construction though first visit did not help me understand the place but my second visit did and i could understand the extensive stone work and even take a guided tour courtsey of a helpful unknown man , he explained how the detailed work on stone is carried out and even slightest variation leaves the stone  unusable.

title: A beautiful temple
review: It belongs to a Hindu sect of Radhasoami, it’s a temple dedicated to Lord Krishna and Radha, very clean and peaceful, a must visit while in Agra

title: The carvings
review: the place is famous for unending work of architecture and carving. This place is said to be under the curse that the carving work will never end. Must watch for tourists

title: Highly Recommend all to visit this place, a place where your mind can find pure relief.
review: Awesome place to visit, Everything is made unique here. Place of Positive energy. The construction is going to finish by september

title: Dayalbagh
review: Also known as the Garden of the Merciful. Serene, clean and tranquil. This describes this place to the final T. Celebrations were on for the 200 years of Radhasoami Satsang.

title: Dayalbagh Soamiji Maharaj Samadh
review: Worth a visit, better than Taj Mahal, A modern day wonder. A must visit site for those who love to see fine architecture and marble carving.

title: Remarkably calm and peaceful in midst of the bustling city of Agra
review: Dayal Bagh seemed a welcome change- a Remarkably calm and peaceful oasis in midst of madness of the bustling city of Agra. The newly completed temple is worth a visit

title: After construction with dome.
review: Visited Dayalbagh after construction was completed adter the dome was erected.

title: A very popular sect of social reformers
review: Radha Swami sect believes in social equality and professes culture values in the society. Their volunteers do selfless social work and do Satsang on holidays.

title: Memorial of Radha Soami Maharaj
review: It is the samadhi of the founder of Radhasoami sect of Sanatan Dharma and has been under construction for a lvery ong time. Finishing touches are still being given and are likely to take few years.

title: beautiful building  with white marble.
review: This is one of the beautiful building in agra with white marble.This is one of the famous temple and lots of devotees come every day to visit  this temple.The gardens are beautiful with magnificent architecture.

title: Excellent Building!!!
review: Dayal Bagh is a very excellent and beautiful building. This is one of the Famous temple in Agra. The building is built with white marbles.

title: marvellous
review: built in marble the place is continuously under addition to its intricate carvings by experienced artists and masons.

title: Religious Place
review: Just beautiful. Don't forget to visit. Great architecture. A place for all religions highly recommended

title: Family Tour
review: It is a beautiful & very famous temple of Agra. It is made up of Marble. A must visit place in Agra.

title: Dayal bagh
review: Good architectural work having intricate cravings on marble enjoy the place and have good pix with friends

title: Very Disapponting
review: The structure is still under construction so visitors cannot see how the final building will look like. It is designed to be a large marble edifice, but that is something for the future.

title: ALSO KNOWN AS SOAMI BAGH
review: Dayal Bagh is an important tourist destination. It is the headquarters of the Radha Soami religious order. Dayal Bagh is famous as being the memorial of Shiv Dayal Sahib, the founder of the Radha Saomi Satsang Movement.The memorial, which is essentially a combination of a temple, church, vihara and mosque was built by Dayal Sahib’s followers to worship him. The Dayal Bagh complex is also home to the Dayal Bagh .It is visited by many devotees every day.It remains Open from 6 am to 6:30 pm Daily.

title: great work of stone crafting
review: stone are crafted do nicely that you will forget that they are not real, it is still under construction and may be it will take 20 more years to complete

title: Soul Stirring Experience.
review: The temple is quite far away from the Taj or the Fatehabad road.A serene place.A temple with the best Architecture. Well laid marbles. Radhey Radhey.

title: OK
review: This is one of the oldest educational institutes in Agra and is well known for its discipline and value based education.A student who acquires education from here can survive any of the hardships of life as this institution believes in shaping individuals who can give a fuller response to the changing conditions.This institute is well known for its regular studies as it is based on the daily home assignment system in which an assignment of 5 marks is given to the students daily and its marks are added in the internals.This institute has excellent faculty and an amazing teacher-student relationship is found.

title: Trip to Dayal Bagh
review: Being a Dentist,some of my clients belonging to Radhasaomi Satsang asked me to visit Dayal Bagh,on my trip to Agra...I did not have any idea at first...After visiting Tajmahal and Agra Fort,i planned a visit to Dayal Bagh.

title: What dreams are made of
review: I will keep this fairly brief. We were lucky enough to get talking to the owner of Dayal Bagh Boutique Hotel and he graciously offered to show us around his community and I'm so glad he did.

title: Beautiful but incomplete
review: Its been several years, but this is still under construction. Very good place to go out with family.

title: Good place to visit
review: a good place to visit in Agra. Good architectural work & it's going on from a long time. A devotional place.

title: Amazing Crafted Architecture!
review: Dayal Bagh made with Stone with serenity. Temple laid with Marbles. Too far from Agra and roads were too bad. It was the Prime office of Radhasaomi. Still under construction and need time to complete it. Not a must visit but if you want to sturggle to get on bad roads then you can.

title: Dayal bagh
review: Dayal bagh is beautifull garden in satsang area of agra ..garden is quite beautifull and good for small picnic or  family together

title: Marble Marvel of Agra
review: Quite place but a huge presence. It has amazing architecture and a beautiful garden. A nice picnic spot to spend 2-3 hours

title: Dayal Bagh, worship place
review: Dayal Bagh, Agra, India, is a famous worship place of Ramdhari,s.

title: Radha Swami
review: A beautiful temple under constructions from years. Magnificent building with nice garden. THe worship place of Radha Swami sect.

title: excellent
review: one can admire the beauty, man made beauty specially hand carved. everything is so beautifully one, one stands mesmerised.

title: Marble beauty !!! very peaceful and serine place !!
review: very peaceful place , lots of good carving done on marbles , its a myth/curse about this place, that construction work in this temple will never end , from last so many years , construction is still on !!! Place you can visit with your entire family!!!  Easily approachable  from bagawan talkies crossing

title: Wonderful religious place.
review: This temple is related to Radhasoami religion.

title: Painstaking but beautiful piece of art
review: This place is filled with intricate carving on marble and other surfaces. Work is still ongoing and we were told it is not likely to be completed anytime soon. No entry fee required but no cameras allowed inside. The workers are followers of radhasoami faith.

title: White stone architecture
review: Although the temple is still under construction . The architecture is very good. Very peaceful place.

title: disappointed
review: This is indeed a nice place : what we could see from outside...

title: Marvelous Architecture
review: This place is a must visit if you are in Argra. The carvings in white marble is better than Taj. The work is still going on.

title: Exceptional creative carvings.
review: Most beautiful stone work of modern time.Wonderful carvings on marble. If you like Art you should visit this place.

title: Temple of its kind
review: This temple is famous for its own kind. It is taking a long time to construct. Last time I visited in March, it was still in construction. Came to know that it was in construction for more than a decade. But the work is very precious.

title: Hidden Gem
review: I believe this place is very underrated, it is a temple with huge complex and built completely with White marble. The carving on each pillar is amazing, this is the finest example of great craftsmanship.

title: Peace full environment  and Lovely structure
review: I visited the Dayal Bagh in last march. it was still in construction but the completed part was with awesome work at stone, its look very beautiful, just visit once if u are first time visitor in Agra....you will find mental piece..

title: A temple worth visiting
review: A beautiful temple made up of marble. work is still in progress but worth seeing how the structure is coming up..

title: Peaceful
review: Very good place to visit.peaceful place ...full of spritual feeling ...very positive aura.....without any negativity...very...beautiful place  tooo.and therefore experience joy and peace.

title: Still in construction
review: We visited this place during our visit to Taj.

title: Dayal Bagh is an amazing piece of architecture
review: Dayal Bagh , also known as Radhasoami temple, is really the "samadhi" of the Sect's founder . The intricate carvings on the white stone marbles are simply out of this world .It is understood that the construction of this super structure began some 112 years and the temple is still in the making -expected to be completed by end of 2018 .

title: Excellent place
review: Built in respect of the 1st guru of Radhasoami faith. It is a wonderful monument and exquisite carvings...has taken a long time to be built...in the final stages now.

title: Temple of Radha Swami cult
review: This is the temple of the people who believe in Radha Swami ideology. The whole temple is built in white marble with all kinds of  engravings and beautiful carvings. The myth is that the ideology will continue if the construction work goes on in the temple. I had visited this temple 36 years back also. The craftsman are working that time and this time aslo.

title: the place to attract !!
review: Dayal bagh is one the beautiful place in Agra where you find peace and to meet Radha Swami people there is no fees to meet or enter the temple and there is also a great institute named D.E.I a engineering and research college and in temple they also teach you how to live simple free life.

title: Radhaswami Dayal
review: This area consists of lots of educational and religious activities ,there building is under construction since last 100 years ,they runs satsand bhavan and schools colleges ,very good work

title: Satsang bhavan is a place of prayer for satsangis
review: In Satsang Bhavan, satsangis benefit the presence of Huzur Sahab & fellow satsangis & do dhyan & prayer.

title: wonderful modern Art
review: mammoth work is going on at this location. had visited this place almost 15 years before also, thinghs have improved a lot post that.

title: Go only for the beautiful carvings
review: The temple is a little over-hyped so if you go with many expectations you shall be disappointed. The carvings are beautiful though and i believe once the temple is complete, they will catch the eyes of the world. As of now though, the temple lies in a state of neglect. It is said to have been under construction from over a hundred years and is not yet complete. The reason is not known but there is a myth going that when all the branches of the Radha Soami faith (the temple belongs to a different religious order called the Radha Soami faith) will unite, only then the temple will be completed. The work is really going on at a snails pace and there will be tools and equipment lying all over the place. Completely made of marble, it is beautiful though and the deserted state combined with the myth does provide an eerie charm to the place. Skip if you are on a short tour, but otherwise do visit, not for history, not for the magnificence but for the beautiful carvings.

title: Very happening Place
review: If u are going to Agra dont Miss Dayal Bagh..... One of the best place in the world. The architected of this Building was simply wow. It takes almost 100 years to built & still working is going on.

title: Mesmerizing carvings.
review: I would tell and request those people  not to listen those who rated dayal 1 or 2 or 3 stars as it is the most beautiful structure in INDIA. It is much mesmerizing than Taj. The carvings are very wonderful. I Know this because my daughter is a painter. I went to various places in the world and this is a structure one shouldn't miss. Yes it is right it is taking a long time to construct this is the thing that will not like by anyone but we all know that sabar ka fal meetha hota hei... VISIT THE PLACE......

title: Peaceful place to visit
review: Very peaceful place to visit monument of radha swami mission followers millions off followers annually visit that place in month of February for basant utsav

title: good place to visit
review: I would tell and request those people not to listen those who rated dayal 1 or 2 or 3 stars as it is the most beautiful structure in INDIA. It is much mesmerizing than Taj. The carvings are very wonderful. I Know this because my daughter is a painter. I went to various places in the world and this is..

title: Making of other wonder temple
review: every time i came here see same but it becoming beautiful , u can see how stone been cut and how contraction of  temple is developed

title: 104 years and still going
review: Nice and peaceful place and must visit the construction is going on for last 104 years the carving are as good as Taj Mahal but mobile phones and camera are not allowed inside open till 4 pm

title: Unfinished structure
review: This is a structure being built by some religious faith known as radha swami satsang. The structure is being built from so many years but there is no sign of completion . Incomplete stone boulders with carving are lying all over the temple area

title: Terrible, goons at gate push you around.
review: Terrible place to visit. They create a ruckus on main entry gate, their goons in the disguise of security guards push women and children around as if they are distributing in a refugee camp. Highly recommend to stay away from this place.

title: You can skip it if u have less time
review: It is not a major attraction but yes worth a visit. A newly constructed Radha Swami temple with good architecture. Not much of an action place.

title: A Good looking company if only It was Complete
review: I went to this place in a hope that it would a decent outing but it turned out to be pretty disappointing.The most of the building was under construction and closed for visitors,what was left was a small garden and the well.If the building gets completed then it would be a great place but if only.The access road to this place is very congested and parking is not ample ,

title: worth visit this place
review: Wonderful carvings on marble. Huge temple complex made out of marble.The most of the building was under construction and closed for visitors,what was left was a small garden and the well.If the building gets completed then it would be a great place but if only

title: Ultimate live sculptirist Creation of mankind in praise of Supreme Being
review: It is a place of religious worship in praise by the followers of Supreme Guru and Founder of Radha Soami Faith His Holliness Soami Ji Maharaj. The Samadh( temple) is under construction since last 100+ years and being constructed in pure white marble. It is beauty personified and cannot be described till actually seen. The inlay work, carvings on marble and sculptures cannot be found any where in the world. This poetry in marble cannot be compared to anything even close to it. Must visit. It's entrance is free.

title: Good Place
review: Currently closed for vistors. Have visited earlier the architecture is great. The marble work is fantastic. Must visit.

title: Good one
review: Soami Bagh is situated in Dayal Bagh its samadhi of their first guru ji. It's a grand project which is being under construction for more than hundred years. It's beautiful and interesting. One must have their literature to understand their thoughts.

title: Ongoing beautiful creation and art
review: better carving/art than the taj mahal or other mughal monuments, over last few decades have been adding to the beauty of new areas and carvings in marble

title: Never ending creation
review: Its a project under construction for more than 100 years.Its a seven story temple complex of which only 3 stories have been reached till now.At this rate it may take at least 200 years or more.Intricate marble carving work maybe better than Taj but never ending.The completed beauty is not there.Only under construction work.Dangerous as falling material may cause injury.

title: Disappointment
review: Had heard a lot that this is comparable to TAJ. Work is going on at  snails pace. Scaffolding prevented good viewing . Stairs were blocked preventing going up. Cobwebs could be seen on many carvings. Even inside broken plaster was fount . Authorities will do well to complete quickly lest people stop going altogether.

title: Temple of Radha Swami Gurus
review: Superb structure of marble carvings is under construction for last 100 years. Work is at very slow pace. Intricate carvings are anyday better than Taj but never ending. Temple is dedicated to First Guru of Radha Swami.

title: Not to Miss in Agra Trip
review: Learn about the good work being done by them. Great piece of regular work and continuous improvement,

title: Good work
review: Near by landmark Bhagvan Talkies .The temple is always under construction since last 10 years.But worth to see .

title: Nice Place
review: If is a nice place to be at.  What ever we saw was good and architecture and carvings were wonderful. The sad part was it was almost closed as it is under construction.

title: No, Dayalbagh is NOT a "Temple"
review: It is most amusing and quite a bit annoying to read reviews of Dayalbagh wherein visitors describe it as a 'Temple' whose construction has been going on since many, many years.

title: Under construction
review: This temple of sect of Radha-Swami. It is being constructed. We have seen the work and the model. It wont be a wonder if it is more beautiful than Taj when finally constructed.

title: Dayal Dagh
review: Copy of Tajmahal tried recently built in Marble though does not touch beauty of Tajmahal by any standards

title: Beautiful
review: Best monument in the agra it was made from 110 yrs but still work not done it's a radha swami temple it's beautiful

title: Marble masterpiece... under construction...
review: Beautiful temple being constructed. From the "work-in-progress" and the model, it looks like it will become another marble masterpiece.

title: Peace
review: Very big complex for the community following Radhasoami. This is maily ment for followers and others have nothing to actually do much.

title: Radhaswami Temple
review: This temple provides a good display of Hindu architectural display. There is not much to do here. The temple is still under construction and said to be under construction for over 100 years. One can visit this place if have time to spare.

title: Nice place
review: the temple was under construction when we got there.. but its a good place especially for a religious traveller

title: Dayal Bagh -- Fall in Love with Merciful Lord
review: Founded on the Basant Day in 1915, Dayal Bagh means "Garden of the Merciful Lord". Located in metropolitan Agra in western Uttar Pradesh. That's a self-sustained colony, where its inhabitants lead an active, disciplined and co-operative community life, conforming to the spiritual ideals of their faith. Affiliated to educational institutes like Dayalbagh Educational Institute. Open garden setting, 4,9 square meters where food-grains, oil-seeds, fodder and vegetables are grown. Very pleasant place.

title: Good place to visit
review: The kind of sculpture and art on the marble is worth appreciating. The construction is happening their for quite long and you can observe the same. Very calm place.

title: radhasoami
review: meditation, good thoughts its the place only for people who want to filter their views and thinking. a samadhi sthal.

title: Incomplete Temple
review: Incomplete temple but very minute and wonderful carvings. Could not enter the temple as it was closed but should be worth a visit once its complete

title: Nice ... But not much to do
review: Nice place. There is not much to about here as of now as the main temple is under construction but you can see the wonderful carvings and enjoy the sights.

title: Stunning stone carving on temple walls and pillars
review: Want to see speaking stones, go there. I haven't seen such a minute carving on stone, so far. Better to take a guide to tell you details.

title: A TEMPLE CONSTRUCTING SINE 100 YEARS
review: Dayal Bagh is a pilgrimage site which is popular for the memorial of Shiv Dayal Sahib, the founder of the Radha Soami Satsang Movement.In memorial Shiv Dayal Sahib is worshiped. The 110 feet high memorial is a combination of temple, gurudwara, vihara and mosque. Memorial is made of pure white marble. This building has been continuously under construction for the past 100 years.I have previously seen in 1970 when i was 16  years  old. Due to construction only basement is now open. So no charm of visiting as a structure. Not a bad place to visit.

title: Near by DEI , Great architecture.
review: Great architecture , Near by Landmark Bhagwan talkies , Also famous DEI.

title: Very good architechture
review: The temple always remain under construction to achieve that 100% BEAUTY and design. But it is a masterpiece of architecture and a must visit place in Agra.

title: Auspicious
review: Look when this completes as they make it and break it and this is continuously happening since many years.

title: Average place top visit
review: The temple of Dayal Bagh is still under construction. As people says it has a curse of one Sadhu that it will not be ready ever. so they keep on doing the alteration.

title: Lots to see
review: There is a great deal to see here with lots of different styles of buildings, take a couple of hours to fully appreciate and see everything on offer.

title: only temple is worth watching
review: it should be last in your visit list .it in a seperate area of city and traffic of agra is tiring and traffic jams common .if on a tight time schedule leave it for second trip

title: Very pleasent place for spiritual acitivities
review: Dayalbagh Radhasoami satsang and Soamibagh are must place to experience. very nice places for spiritual search and Soamibagh is a beautiful architecture piece.

title: A in between temple
review: I was on a family trip, from Agra to Jaipur, when I visited this temple. You may see this temple, it is a god one, but the location of temple is in quite interiors.

title: A dedicated sect
review: Theo's sect is unique and a symbol of love affection and brotherhood . It teaches how to be independent and loving as well

title: Taj like monument under construction for decades
review: A great monument is under construction now for decades, to beat the beauty and architecture of Taj Mahal. A must see

title: will be better than taj when complet
review: taj will lose the charm when this will be complet as it is very pritty and well maintain affair the people are taking pains for the nice and clean  place and no undue charges are laveed on the tourist

title: Beautiful
review: its a beautiful structure with intricate carvings on the walls, the people there have done really amazing job.

title: Worth to visit
review: People says its construction is running since last 120 years. Beautiful marbel carved temple, it is worth to visit it.

title: Dayalbagh is good but overcrowded
review: Dayalbagh temple is good and anyone like to visit but surrounding area is overcrowded and garbage is littered here and there. It looks it need attention of agra authority to get its due glory.

title: Still not Complete!!!
review: Its taking so many years to complete.When I asked,they replied it will take 20 years more to complete.but carving,marble designs are seriously very nice.I was wondering how they create design so nicely...should visit there.

title: Never ending construction
review: Was keen to see the dome erected, I don't know how long we have to wait,the artisans creating the master piece from their skills carefully nurtured by the trustees

title: Absolutely stunning
review: The temple in Dayal Bagh is a marble temple under construction for over 110 years.  The designs and carvings are absolutely stunning.  It's a must see in Agra after Taj Mahal.  It's located in the suburb of Agra and about 10-15 min. drive from the city center.

title: Visit only if you have extra time
review: Looks very much like being inspired by Taj Mahal but the amalgamation of Mughal, Rajasthani and European styles of architecture do not give a homogeneous look. Some of the marble is yellowing more than the Taj Mahal itself which is older by 500 years.

title: An interesting place to visit
review: Tucked away and not frequently visited, Dayal Bagh offers the visitor a "living / under construction" monument. It is said to have been under construction for more than a hundred years. Marble carved motifs are interesting and so is the central dome.

title: Garden of Merciful! - That's how it is called
review: Dayalbagh is a different World!

title: I think must visit if you are a radha swami
review: Nothing much actually but if one is familiar to radha swami culture then must visit as its the place of Guru of the founder of the sect so that makes it extremely important

title: Nice place and Beautiful temple
review: You would love the carvings of the temple there.

title: Radha Swami Temple
review: This temple is said to be under construction since past 100 years, and probably will be completed in 2016. Excellent specimen of art & architecture. Wish to visit it as soon as it is over.

title: Visit to Dayal Bagh
review: A mysterious place where people say that this building is a never ending construction and cannot be completed. There is a Jinx attached to it. But beautiful.

title: swami bhagh
review: i go swami bagh see the artitechure & white marbale hand made art on stone , very good art in stone fruits & tree,

title: Beautiful work of art
review: This is probably one of the most amazing constructions I have ever seen in my life. Amazing detail and beautiful marble work like no other. The decor and the writing are simply gorgeous and breathtaking.

title: Radha Swami Temple, with beautiful Architechture
review: Situated in Agra this temple has a beautiful art work on marble for which the city is famous, it is said that the structures were demolished several times to change, but the intentions of the Holy Guru was that these changes provides job the poor but skilled artisans who's art work was traditional and was dying, the people of Radha Swami sect welcome all visitors with respect and one feels very homely with them.

title: Prestigious carving work. Hats Off!
review: I enjoyed and really loved this place for its great work. A true man carved heaven on earth. Great work done

title: never ending story.....But worth visiting
review: This a under construction temple a no one knows for how long it will take to complete.

title: Radhaswami
review: Pleasant place to go yo..you'll find peace and solace there..if one wants to learn something about RadhaSwami..than there is a bookstall there where you can buy books for really low price like ₹1.

title: built by a sant guru
review: It is being built by the Radhasoami Faith religion. It is located in the metropolitan region of Agra.

title: Nice to watch
review: When it will complete no one knows. The memento is still under construction from last 200 hundred years ago as our guide said.

title: Weird
review: This is a strange place.  I was warned by my taxi driver not to speak to anyone and I am glad he warned me.  The Mandir is being built over a hundred year period by a relatively unknown Hindu sect.

title: Beautiful & Holy
review: The Marble work is exquisite some where even beyond Taj. The feeling of associated Holiness of the shrine insinuates deeply within yourself.

title: Marvellous
review: Great piece of architecture.Its a huge structure coming up and what I know its been constructed last 109 years and will take another 10-12 years to complete. Great

title: Quiet, peaceful & advanced
review: Its a locality of Agra with lots of attractions & specialties. Whether it be a piece of sculpture & masonry; "The Swamibag Temple, or the Gracious Dayalbagh University or its farm houses or the Banks of Yamuna river, every singl thing is worth mentioning. Some of the nice eco-friendly cafes & tea stalls.

title: religious site
review: This place is too far from Taj. It is hard too manage time for this monument if you have only one day in Agra. Construction of this site is still not completed. There is no entry fees.

title: Superb Art Work
review: Dayal Bagh is famous for the temple of Radha Swami. Its a great art work. We can say its Hindu Taj. But its not complete till now. Still the work is going on. You can see the hard work of the peoples doing in day & night to make it complete.

title: Nature in marble
review: This is a temple of a particular Sect and has got religious importance. The monument is under construction for last so many years. The artisans working here are very much dedicated

title: Lower than expectations
review: Likes-not worth mentioning

title: DAYAL BAGH THE ENDLESS STORY
review: Its very good to see Dayal Bagh a temple which is continuously under construction . Wonderful stone art is seen there but to enter to the street where it is situated is hazardous because of unauthorised vendors who choke the road. Though the area of this temple is spacious.

title: good place to visit
review: Dayal bagh is a good place to visit in Agra, don't miss it, this place has its own history. It is on the outskirts of the historic city of Agra, the campus is situated in garden settings, away from the noise of the city. Nestled between lush green fields, it provides an excellent ambience.

title: Most Visit
review: Amazing hand work on marble,

title: very beautiful and large
review: very beautiful building being constructed by radha swami mission,but still under constructions.we missed photography here as mobiles and cameras are not allowed inside.

title: excellent carving,average maintenance..
review: seeing it since many years.still it is a very incomplete building.Marble carving is excellent. must visit here.

title: The ever under construction temple.
review: The Dayal bagh followers believe in continuous building activity. They are trying to build a temple more beautiful than the Taj. So the ever going on carving activity. If you have time, this is an interesting place.

title: will it compete with Taj ?
review: It  is a sorry    state of affairs that  another master piece  cannot be completed even after 90/100 yrs. Reason gi ven unofficially is paucity of  funds. Where are our art lovers and donors ?  Though

title: Dayal Bagh
review: It was good to see dayal bagh. It is famous for dayal bagh educational institute. Surroundings are good. Study atmosphere is very good.

title: Upcoming wonder of world.
review: If any thing can take over the great taj it is Dayal bagh temple. it has what ever it takes to be 7 wonders of the world. the construction is on from 2 centuries. and expected 1 more century more atleast. you will always see people working their. beautiful architecture and magnificent art. you will love this place if you respect true art.

title: Wonder in making
review: Beautiful stone carving by artisens is unique feature of this on going under construction temple. The pillar carving being done can be seen live.

title: Stunning carving
review: This monument is made with marble and has stunning carvings of flowers, fruits etc done on marble. It creates a beautiful 3D impression. Since everything is very intricate, one can imagine why it takes so long to finish this structure.

title: The incomplete mystery
review: Cant resist  visiting it again and again, have been six to seven times in the last four decades, one just cant stop admiring the artistry. the intricate carvings done by nameless artisans. The temple remains incomplete I think more out of intention of the trust than due any other reasons since it adds to the mystery and myth. Certainly recommended for a visit on your way back from Taj if you are driving to/from Delhi

title: not very exciting!!!
review: this is a building which is undergoing construction since 1904, but i don't know why it looks to me like just another building of marbel. Though they have put lot of efforts in crafting and placing it. But i was not very excited once i saw this... Excitement lasts till we visited this place.

title: the posh area with peace
review: the Radhaswami temple is the biggest attraction of this area., the campus of temple is beyind imagination.

title: Amazing place
review: DayalBagh is still under construction but you can see the fantastic inalay marble work. I believe it is more then Taj Mahal. If you are planning to visit Taj. Don't miss this place.

title: Under Construction
review: the last time I visited here was during 2002 and it was under construction. This time when I went again, I found it still under construction. Although its taking years to complete this but the day its fully ready, it will beat the beautiful work of Taj. These days, this place is dusty and closed for work but you can still see some area. The work done on marble is marvelous :)

title: Beautiful carvings
review: The work is ongoing and you will be amazed to see the carvings. you can see beautiful carvings of vegetables and fruits, trees, plants etc.

title: DayalBagh Temple
review: If u have extra time ,then do for a visit.else skip it.

title: Radha Swami temple at Dayal Bagh
review: Was fascinated by the history of the cursed Radha Swami temple. Its been almost 100 years since it's construction began and it is still incomplete.

title: Under Construction, Avoid
review: from 1904 till present its under construction there is nothing to see.

title: Some of the most intricate marble works
review: We were amazed to see the detailed marble works at this place. Although the place is huge, but works are still going on. We were told by our guide that this is a mini self sufficient city.

title: Good place for serenity
review: Dayalbagh form a major tourist attraction of the area and are generally included in most tours conducted in the vicinity of Agra. Its architecture forms an amalgamation of the traits of different religions like the Radhasoami Satsang movement itself.This place is an attractive feature of the memorial is that the construction work at the site is a continuous process.

title: very late
review: this is a white temple of shri radhswami ji. it is in building process for last so many years but still work is not completed due to lack of funds. the pacchekari overhere is awesome and it comptetes with tajmahal marble inlay art. but definitly tajmahals marble inlay art is better

title: a serene and noise free place.
review: this place is not for curios onlookers or tourists. those who have some info on the philosphy of this sect should pay this a visit and sit through the satsang once atleast.

title: for peace loving...
review: This building is under construction for last so many years but still work is not completed due to lack of funds. But I still recommend a visit to this place as the architecture of this building is too good.
